oai_dc:dc.dc:title: American Homes, March 1902
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: American Homes. How To Build Them, How To Plan Them, How To Pay For Them, How To Beautify Them. Vol. XIV, No. 3. March 1902. The Hite-Smith Publishing Co. 156 Fifth Ave., New York City. New York's Suburbs Illustrated. Only articles by George F. Barber or associates have full text transcriptions.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: architects; architecture;
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: George F. Barber Collection--Gift of Michael and Carolyn Dufano
